typography.instructions: Import Manrope from Google Fonts. Use it for all h1-h6. Use Inter for p, span, input, button.

colors.usage_rules: Do NOT use generic blue. Use the 'primary' (Deep Teal) for main actions. Use 'accent' (Coral) sparingly for urgent CTAs or badges. Backgrounds should never be pure white in light mode, use the tinted off-white.

layout.spacing_scale: Use 2x standard spacing. If you think p-4 is enough, use p-8.
layout.border_radius: rounded-xl (0.75rem) for cards, rounded-full for buttons

grids.landing_hero: Bento Grid Mode A (Tetris). Asymmetric. Hero image col-span-8, supporting text col-span-4.
grids.comparison_table: Sticky header. Row highlighting on hover. 'Tracing Beam' effect on the 'Best Value' column.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:opacity-90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Flat with subtle border in light mode. Soft glow in dark mode.
cards.classes: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: Tall and airy. h-12 or h-14.
inputs.classes: bg-input/20 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg

navigation.classes: backdrop-blur-xl bg-background/70 border-b border-border/40 sticky top-0 z-50

anti_ai_rules: Do NOT use Inter for headings. Use Manrope.
Do NOT use generic blue (#3B82F6) for primary actions. Use the defined Teal.
Do NOT center everything. Use asymmetric layouts.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Do NOT use 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic dental copy (e.g., 'Root Canal', 'Invisalign', 'Dr. Smith').

accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided. 2. Install 'lucide-react' for icons. 3. Create the 'Manrope' font import in index.css. 4. Build the Landing Page using the Bento Grid strategy. 5. Build the Comparison Page using the 'Tracing Beam' concept for the best value column.
